tool_description:
Provides historycal and real-time access to stock, options, bonds, currencies, cryptocurrency quotes for all American and European exchanges and other financial instruments. Stay updated with the latest market information and make informed investment decisions.  

With our service, you can harness the power of advanced algorithms to develop intricate and intelligent trading strategies. Our platform provides the tools and resources needed to create complex algorithms that can analyze market da...
name: FinQuo
title: FinQuo

api_list.name: Top Traded Stocks
Custom Strategy

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: Order the development of an individual strategy

api_list.name: Subscribe for News
api_list.description: Subscribe to the newsletter that we collect from all over the Internet with analytics and price impact forecasts

api_list.name: Real Time Price & Info

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Symbol can be an array. symbol=[AAPL,MDB]

api_list.name: Real Time Last Candle Prices
api_list.description:
Real Time Last Candle Prices. 
Format Candle [DateTime UTC+0, Open, High, Low, Close, Volume]

api_list.name: Quotes Pre/Post/RTH Market [+Real Time]
api_list.description: All quotes for all the time + Unfinished Candle

api_list.name: Quotes Regular Trading Hours [History]
api_list.description:
Get historical data Stock Quotes, just only for Regular Trading Hours: American/New York TZ: 9:30 am - 4pm.

Candle [DateTime UTC, Open, High, Low, Close, Volume]

api_list.name: Holiday and Weekend Calendar
api_list.description: Dates of all holidays and weekends in the past and future

api_list.name: Alerts
api_list.description: Subscribe for alerts when price across it.

required_parameters.name: timeframe
required_parameters.description: 1m, 5m, 30m, 60m, 1d. If you need other timeframes - contact to us

api_list.name: Search Symbol
api_list.description: You can find the symbol you need to retrieve data for by using our search functionality. It allows you to search for symbols based on keywords or terms. Once you find the desired symbol, you will obtain its identifier, which you can then use to request data specifically for that symbol. This convenient search feature simplifies the process of accessing the data you require, ensuring that you can quickly and easily retrieve the information you need.

api_list.name: Trading Strategy
api_list.description: Subscribe to receive information about entry points for our authoring strategies. We can also develop your individual strategy for you.

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: Enter your email where we send the signal

api_list.name: Get News
Quotes Regular Trading Hours [+Real Time]
api_list.description: Quotes Regular Trading Hours for current trading session with Unfinished Candle

api_list.name: Gateway Status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://finquo5.p.rapidapi.com/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finquo5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://finquo5.p.rapidapi.com/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finquo5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
